name: @carto/cra-template
description: CARTO template for Create React App

scripts.clean: cd template && rm -rf _templates && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package.json && rm -f yarn.lock && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.release: yarn clean && cp template/README.md README.md && cp -r ../hygen/_templates template/_templates && sync && yarn publish --access public --non-interactive
